full_description:
Aigo DarkFlash A290 Tempered Glass ATX Gaming Case

Gaming setups are not complete without a powerful PC that can handle the latest games and graphics. But, with limited space in most homes, it's important to find a compact and efficient solution. The darkFlash A290 MATX PC Case Black is a perfect option for those who want a stylish, powerful, and space-saving solution. In this article, we will take an in-depth look at this innovative PC case and discuss why it's an ideal choice for gamers and PC enthusiasts.

Design & Build Quality

The darkFlash A290 MATX PC Case Black has a sleek, black design that adds a touch of sophistication to any gaming setup. The case is built with high-quality materials, including tempered glass and steel, which ensures durability and sturdiness. The case's compact size makes it perfect for small spaces, but it still has enough room to accommodate a standard Micro ATX motherboard and up to two 2.5-inch SSDs.

Performance & Compatibility

The darkFlash A290 MATX PC Case Black is compatible with a wide range of hardware, including standard Micro ATX motherboards and most standard-sized graphics cards. The case can also support up to three 120mm fans, which can be mounted on the front, top, and rear of the case, depending on your preferred configuration. With its compact size and high-quality materials, this case provides excellent thermal performance and noise reduction.

Cooling & Airflow

The darkFlash A290 MATX PC Case Black comes with excellent cooling features to keep your hardware cool even under heavy loads. The case's front panel is designed with a mesh pattern that maximizes airflow and allows cool air to flow in easily. Additionally, the case's compact size and high-quality materials provide excellent thermal performance and noise reduction.

Port & Connectivity

The darkFlash A290 MATX PC Case Black comes with a range of connectivity options, including a USB 3.0 port and audio jacks. The front panel of the case is also equipped with an LED power button that adds a touch of style to your build.

full_description:
Aigo DarkFlash DK431 E-ATX Full Mesh PC Gaming Case

The darkFlash DK431 EATX Full Mesh PC Case is beautifully made of metal with a full mesh front panel to provide maximum airflow. The tempered glass side panel is perfect for showing off your components and makes upgrading a breeze. The spacious interior supports up to 400mm GPUs and 360mm water cooling radiators, so you can be sure your system will stay cool even under the most intense gaming sessions. Plus, the bottom-mounted power supply ensures easy installation.

Personal Mini Work Station

Aigo DarkFlash DK431 E-ATX Full Mesh PC Gaming Case has sufficient Internal Space and it is compatible with ATX, Micro-ATX, Mini-ATX motherboard. This case supports CPU coolers up to 165mm tall and GPU up to 350mm long, you can install GPU horizontally and vertically with a VGA holder, It can support 2Pcs 3.5â HDD and 2Pcs 2.5â SSD drive bays. Supports 4 Additional hard drives which results in maximizing your storage space. This casing can be said as one of the perfect compact word station for content creators, music artists, and freelancers.

Support 360MM Radiator

The DarkFlash DK431 Gaming Casing Supports Top 360mm Radiator with support for up to a 360mm liquid cooling radiator in top, the case is easy to build with and easy to cool your CPU better. Door Opening Design: Hinged and magnetic tempered glass side panel with hand provide convenient to remove without any tools. Multi-functional I/O Panel: USB3.0/2x USB2.0/HD AUDIO/RESET/POWER. It can provide you great flexibility for various mobile audio accessories.

Buy Aigo DarkFlash DK431 E-ATX Full Mesh PC Gaming Case With PSU from Star Tech
